mapper.select: SELECT P.SEQ postSeq , BC.SEQ categorySeq , TU.SEQ authorSeq , CASE WHEN P.PREPEND != '' THEN '[ ' || P.PREPEND || ' ]' || P.TITLE ELSE P.TITLE END title , P.CONTENT , TU.NAME authorNm , BC.NAME cateogyNm , BP.IDNTF_NM , TU.PHOTO_URL , P.READCOUNT , P.LIKECOUNT , TO_CHAR(P.CREATEDAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') createdAt FROM POSTS P JOIN TB_USER TU ON P.AUTHOR = TU.SEQ JOIN BASE_PERMISSION BP ON TU.IDNTF_CD = BP.IDNTF_CD JOIN BASE_CATEGORY BC ON P.LOWERSEQ = BC.SEQ WHERE CAST(P.SEQ AS VARCHAR) = #{posts} AND CAST(P.LOWERSEQ AS VARCHAR) = #{category}
